00031 eolComponentList *eol_component_get_list_data(eolComponent *component)
00032 {
00033   if ((!component)||
00034     (!component->componentData)||
00035     (component->type != eolListComponent))
00036   {
00037     return NULL;
00038   }
00039   return (eolComponentList*)component->componentData;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void eol_list_move(eolComponent *component,eolRect newbounds)
00043 {
00044   eolComponentList * list;
00045   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,newbounds, component->rect);
00046   list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00047   if (list == NULL)return;
00048   
00049   list->itemBounds.x = component->bounds.x;
00050   list->itemBounds.y = component->bounds.y;
00051   list->itemBounds.w = component->bounds.w;
00052   list->itemBounds.h = component->bounds.h;
00053     list->vSliderBounds.h = component->bounds.h;
00054     list->vSliderBounds.y = component->bounds.y;
00055     list->vSliderBounds.x = component->bounds.x + component->bounds.w;
00056     list->hSliderBounds.w = component->bounds.w;
00057     list->hSliderBounds.x = component->bounds.x;
00058     list->hSliderBounds.y = component->bounds.y + component->bounds.h;
00059 }

00061 eolComponent *eol_list_new(
00062     eolUint       id,
00063     eolWord       name,
00064     eolRectFloat  rect,
00065     eolRect       bounds,
00066     eolUint       listType,
00067     eolVec2D      itemDimensions,
00068     eolBool       showVSlider,
00069     eolBool       showHSlider,
00070     eolBool       allowSelection,
00071     eolBool       showBackground,
00072     eolUint       fontSize,
00073     eolVec3D      textColor,
00074     eolFloat      alpha
00075   )
00076 {
00077   eolRectFloat slideRect = {0,0,1,1};
00078   eolComponent *component = NULL;
00079   eolComponentList *list = NULL;
00080   component = eol_component_new();
00081   if (!component)return NULL;
00082 
00083   eol_rectf_copy(&component->rect,rect);
00084   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,bounds, rect);
00085 
00086   eol_component_make_list(
00087     component,
00088     listType,
00089     showHSlider,
00090     showVSlider,
00091     itemDimensions,
00092     fontSize
00093   );
00094 
00095   list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00096   if (list == NULL)
00097   {
00098     eol_component_free(&component);
00099     return NULL;
00100   }
00101   list->allowSelection = allowSelection;
00102   list->showBackground = showBackground;
00103   component->id = id;
00104   eol_word_cpy(component->name,name);
00105   component->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00106   list->itemBounds.x = component->bounds.x;
00107   list->itemBounds.y = component->bounds.y;
00108   list->itemBounds.w = component->bounds.w;
00109   list->itemBounds.h = component->bounds.h;
00110 
00111   if (showVSlider)
00112   {
00113     list->vSliderBounds.h = component->bounds.h;
00114     list->vSliderBounds.y = component->bounds.y;
00115     list->vSliderBounds.w = 25;/*TODO: make a function for getting width of slider*/
00116     list->vSliderBounds.x = component->bounds.x + component->bounds.w;
00117     list->vSlider = eol_slider_common_new(
00118       0,
00119       "vertical_scroll",
00120       slideRect,
00121       list->vSliderBounds,
00122       eolTrue,
00123       eol_vec3d(0,0,0),
00124       0
00125     );
00126   }
00127   if (showHSlider)
00128   {
00129     list->hSliderBounds.w = component->bounds.w;
00130     list->hSliderBounds.x = component->bounds.x;
00131     list->hSliderBounds.h = 25;/*TODO: make a function for getting width of slider*/
00132     list->hSliderBounds.y = component->bounds.y + component->bounds.h;
00133     list->hSlider = eol_slider_common_new(
00134       0,
00135       "horizontal_scroll",
00136       slideRect,
00137       list->hSliderBounds,
00138       eolFalse,
00139       eol_vec3d(0,0,0),
00140       0
00141     );
00142   }
00143   eol_vec3d_copy(list->textColor,textColor);
00144   list->alpha = alpha;
00145   return component;
00146 }

00149 void eol_component_list_free(eolComponent *component)
00150 {
00151   GList *l;
00152   eolComponentList * list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00153   if (list == NULL)return;
00154   eol_component_free(&list->vSlider);
00155   eol_component_free(&list->hSlider);
00156   l = list->itemList;
00157   while (l != NULL)
00158   {
00159     eol_component_free((eolComponent**)&l->data);
00160   }
00161   g_list_free(list->itemList);
00162   list->itemList = NULL;
00163   free(list);
00164   component->componentData = NULL;
00165 }
00166 
00167 eolBool eol_list_item_bound_check(eolComponentList *list,eolRect item)
00168 {
00169   eolRect b;
00170   b.x = list->itemBounds.x + list->displayItems.x;
00171   b.y = list->itemBounds.y + list->displayItems.y;
00172   b.w = list->itemBounds.w - (list->displayItems.x * 2);
00173   b.h = list->itemBounds.h - (list->displayItems.y * 2);
00174   return (eol_rect_lap_rect(b, item));
00175 }
00176 
00177 void eol_component_list_draw(eolComponent *component, eolRect bounds)
00178 {
00179   eolRect r;
00180   eolVec2D itemPos = {0,0};
00181   eolVec2D scaleArea;
00182   int position = 0;
00183   GList *it = NULL;
00184   eolComponentListItem *item = NULL;
00185   eolComponentList *list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00186   if (list == NULL)return;
00187   r.x = component->bounds.x - 1;
00188   r.y = component->bounds.y - 1;
00189   r.w = component->bounds.w + 2;
00190   r.h = component->bounds.h + 2;
00191   if (list->showBackground)
00192     eol_draw_solid_rect(component->bounds,eol_vec3d(0.1,0.1,0.1),1);
00193   /*draw list items*/
00194   scaleArea = eol_component_list_scaleable_area(list);
00195   /*TODO make the iterator start at the top position of the scroll*/
00196   for (it = list->itemList,position = 0;it != NULL;it = it->next,position++)
00197   {
00198     if (!it->data)continue;
00199     item = (eolComponentListItem*)it->data;
00200     itemPos = eol_component_list_get_item_position(component,position);
00201     item->item->bounds.x = itemPos.x;
00202     item->item->bounds.y = itemPos.y;
00203     if (!eol_list_item_bound_check(list,item->item->bounds))continue;
00204     if (item->selected)
00205     {
00206       eol_draw_solid_rect(item->item->bounds,list->highlightColor,0.9);
00207     }
00208     if (item->highlight)
00209     {
00210       eol_draw_rect(item->item->bounds,list->highlightColor,1);
00211     }
00212     eol_component_draw(item->item,item->item->bounds);
00213   }
00214   if (list->showBackground)
00215     eol_draw_rect(r,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00216   if ((list->showVSlider) && (scaleArea.y > 1))
00217   {
00218     eol_component_draw(list->vSlider,list->vSliderBounds);
00219   }
00220   if ((list->showHSlider) && (scaleArea.x > 1))
00221   {
00222     eol_component_draw(list->hSlider,list->hSliderBounds);
00223   }
00224 }
00225 
00226 eolBool eol_component_list_update(eolComponent *component)
00227 {
00228   GList *it = NULL;
00229   eolVec2D scaleArea;
00230   eolFloat slide = 0;
00231   eolComponentList *list;
00232   eolComponentListItem *item = NULL;
00233   eolBool updated = eolFalse;
00234   list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00235   if (list == NULL)return eolFalse;
00236   /*Update Sliders if visible*/
00237   scaleArea = eol_component_list_scaleable_area(list);
00238   if ((list->showVSlider) && (scaleArea.y > 1))
00239   {
00240     if (eol_component_update(list->vSlider))
00241     {
00242       updated = eolTrue;
00243       slide = eol_slider_get_position(list->vSlider);
00244       list->topOffset.y = -(scaleArea.y * slide);
00245     }
00246     slide = eol_slider_get_position(list->vSlider);
00247     list->topOffset.y = -(scaleArea.y * slide);
00248   }
00249   slide = 0;
00250   if ((list->showHSlider) && (scaleArea.x > 1))
00251   {
00252     if (eol_component_update(list->hSlider) || updated)
00253     {
00254       updated = eolTrue;
00255     }
00256     slide = eol_slider_get_position(list->hSlider);
00257     list->topOffset.x = -(scaleArea.x * slide);
00258   }
00259   /*iterate through glist and update elements*/
00260   if (list->allowSelection)
00261   {
00262     for (it = list->itemList;it != NULL;it = it->next)
00263     {
00264       if (!it->data)continue;
00265       item = (eolComponentListItem*)it->data;
00266       if ((eol_mouse_in_rect(item->item->bounds)) &&
00267           (eol_list_item_bound_check(list,item->item->bounds)))
00268       {
00269         item->highlight = eolTrue;
00270         if (eol_mouse_input_released(eolMouseLeft))
00271         {
00272           eol_component_list_select_item(component,item);
00273           list->selection = it;
00274           updated = eolTrue;
00275         }
00276       }
00277       else item->highlight = eolFalse;
00278     }
00279   }
00280   return updated;
00281 }
00282 
00283 void eol_component_make_list(
00284     eolComponent * component,
00285     eolUint   listType,
00286     eolBool   showHSlider,
00287     eolBool   showVSlider,
00288     eolVec2D  displayItems,
00289     eolUint   fontSize
00290   )
00291 {
00292   eolComponentList * list = NULL;
00293   if (!component)return;
00294   eol_component_list_new(component);
00295   list = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00296   if (list == NULL)
00297   {
00298     return;
00299   }
00300   list->numPerRow = 1;
00301   list->itemPadding.x = 8;
00302   list->itemPadding.y = 8;
00303   eol_vec3d_set(list->highlightColor,0,1,1);
00304   list->fontSize = fontSize;
00305   switch(listType)
00306   {
00307     default:
00308     case eolListText:
00309       displayItems.y = eol_font_get_text_height_average(list->fontSize);
00310       displayItems.x = component->bounds.w - (list->itemPadding.x * 2);
00311     case eolListLines:
00312       break;
00313     case eolListBlock:
00314       break;
00315     case eolListDock:
00316       list->numPerRow = -1;
00317       break;
00318   }
00319   list->listType = listType;
00320   eol_vec2d_copy(list->displayItems,displayItems);
00321   list->showVSlider = showVSlider;
00322   list->showHSlider = showHSlider;
00323   component->data_free = eol_component_list_free;
00324   component->data_draw = eol_component_list_draw;
00325   component->data_update = eol_component_list_update;
00326   component->data_move = eol_list_move;
00327 }

00329 eolComponentListItem * eol_list_item_new()
00330 {
00331   eolComponentListItem *item = NULL;
00332   item = (eolComponentListItem *)malloc(sizeof(eolComponentListItem));
00333   if (item == NULL)
00334   {
00335     eol_logger_message(
00336       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00337       "eol_component_list: failed to allocate list item\n");
00338     return NULL;
00339   }
00340   memset(item,0,sizeof(eolComponentListItem));
00341   return item;
00342 }
00343 
00344 void eol_list_item_free(eolComponentListItem **item)
00345 {
00346   if ((!item)||(!item))return;
00347   eol_component_free(&(*item)->item);
00348   free(*item);
00349   *item = NULL;
00350 }
00351 
00352 void eol_list_add_item(eolComponent *list,eolComponent *item)
00353 {
00354   eolVec2D itemPos;
00355   eolComponentList * ldata;
00356   eolComponentListItem *listItem;
00357   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(list);
00358   if ((!ldata) || (!item))return;/*no op*/
00359   listItem = eol_list_item_new();
00360   if (!listItem)return;/*couldn't add, BAD*/
00361     listItem->item = item;
00362   eol_rectf_set(&item->rect,0,0,1,1);
00363   
00364   itemPos = eol_component_list_get_item_position(list,ldata->itemCount);
00365   item->bounds.w = ldata->displayItems.x;
00366   item->bounds.h = ldata->displayItems.y;
00367   item->bounds.x = itemPos.x;
00368   item->bounds.y = itemPos.y;
00369   /*x position will be set at draw*/
00370   ldata->itemList = g_list_append(ldata->itemList,listItem);
00371   ldata->itemCount++;
00372   /*Update item's rect and bounds to reflect position in list*/
00373 }

00375 void eol_list_add_text_item(
00376     eolComponent  * list,
00377     eolUint         itemId,
00378     eolLine         text
00379   )
00380 {
00381   eolComponent *label = NULL;
00382   eolComponentList * ldata;
00383   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(list);
00384   if (!ldata)return;
00385   label = eol_label_new(
00386     itemId,
00387     "label_item",
00388     list->rect,
00389     list->bounds,
00390     eolTrue,
00391     text,
00392     eolJustifyLeft,
00393     eolFalse,
00394     ldata->fontSize,
00395     NULL,
00396     ldata->textColor,
00397     ldata->alpha
00398   );
00399   eol_list_add_item(list,label);
00400 }
00401 
00402 void eol_component_list_new(eolComponent *component)
00403 {
00404   if (component->componentData != NULL)
00405   {
00406     eol_logger_message(
00407       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00408       "eol_component:tried to make a list out of an existing component\n");
00409     return;
00410   }
00411   component->componentData = malloc(sizeof(eolComponentList));
00412   if (component->componentData == NULL)
00413   {
00414     eol_logger_message(
00415       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00416       "eol_actor: failed to allocate data for new list\n");
00417     return;
00418   }
00419   memset(component->componentData,0,sizeof(eolComponentList));
00420   component->type = eolListComponent;
00421 }

00423 void eol_component_list_select_item_n(
00424     eolComponent *component,
00425     eolUint       n
00426   )
00427 {
00428   eolComponentListItem *item;
00429   eolComponentList * ldata;
00430   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00431   if (!ldata)return;
00432   item = (eolComponentListItem *)g_list_nth(ldata->itemList,n);
00433   eol_component_list_select_item(
00434     component,
00435     item
00436   );
00437 }
00438 
00439 void eol_component_list_select_item(
00440     eolComponent *component,
00441     eolComponentListItem *item
00442   )
00443 {
00444   eolComponentList * ldata;
00445   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00446   if (!ldata)return;
00447   ldata->selection = g_list_find(ldata->itemList,item);
00448   if (!ldata->selection)
00449   {
00450     eol_logger_message(
00451       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00452       "failed to find item in list for selection!\n");
00453     return;
00454   }
00455   if (!ldata->multiSelection)
00456   {
00457     eol_component_list_deselect_all(component);
00458   }
00459   item->selected = eolTrue;
00460 }
00461 
00462 void eol_component_list_deselect_all(
00463     eolComponent *component
00464   )
00465 {
00466   GList *it = NULL;
00467   eolComponentListItem *item;
00468   eolComponentList * ldata;
00469   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(component);
00470   if (!ldata)return;
00471   ldata->selection = NULL;
00472   for (it = ldata->itemList;it != NULL;it = it->next)
00473   {
00474     if (!it->data)continue;
00475     item = (eolComponentListItem *)it->data;
00476     item->selected = eolFalse;
00477   }
00478 }
00479 
00480 eolBool eol_component_list_get_selected_item(eolComponent **itemOut,eolComponent *list)
00481 {
00482   eolComponentListItem *item;
00483   eolComponentList * ldata;
00484   if (!itemOut)return eolFalse;
00485   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(list);
00486   if (!ldata)return eolFalse;
00487   if (ldata->selection == NULL)return eolFalse;
00488   item = (eolComponentListItem *)ldata->selection->data;
00489   if (!item)return eolFalse;
00490   *itemOut = item->item;
00491   return eolTrue;
00492 }
00493 
00494 eolBool eol_component_list_get_selected_id(eolUint *id,eolComponent *list)
00495 {
00496   eolComponent *item;
00497   if (!id)return eolFalse;
00498   if (!eol_component_list_get_selected_item(&item,list))return eolFalse;
00499   if (item == NULL)return eolFalse;
00500   *id = item->id;
00501   return eolTrue;
00502 }
00503 
00504 eolVec2D eol_component_list_scaleable_area(eolComponentList *list)
00505 {
00506   eolVec2D listArea;
00507   eolVec2D scaleArea = {0,0};
00508   if (!list)return scaleArea;
00509   listArea = eol_component_list_get_total_area(list);
00510   scaleArea.x = listArea.x - list->itemBounds.w;
00511   scaleArea.y = listArea.y - list->itemBounds.h;
00512   return scaleArea;
00513 }
00514 
00515 eolVec2D eol_component_list_get_total_area(eolComponentList *list)
00516 {
00517   eolVec2D area = {0,0};
00518   eolUint rows = 1,cols = 1;
00519   if (!list)return area;
00520   if (list->numPerRow)
00521   {
00522     rows = list->itemCount / list->numPerRow;
00523     cols = list->itemCount % list->numPerRow;
00524   }
00525   else
00526   {
00527     rows = list->itemCount;
00528   }
00529   area.x = (list->displayItems.x + list->itemPadding.x) * cols;
00530   area.y = (list->displayItems.y + list->itemPadding.y) * rows;
00531   return area;
00532 }
00533 
00534 eolVec2D eol_component_list_get_item_position(eolComponent *list,eolUint position)
00535 {
00536   eolComponentList *ldata;
00537   eolVec2D pos = {0,0};
00538   eolUint  row = position,col = 0;
00539   ldata = eol_component_get_list_data(list);
00540   if (!ldata)return pos;
00541   /*TODO: offset based on scroll position*/
00542   if (ldata->numPerRow > 1)
00543   {
00544     col = position % ldata->numPerRow;
00545     row = position / ldata->numPerRow;
00546   }
00547   pos.x = (col * (ldata->displayItems.x + ldata->itemPadding.x)) + ldata->itemBounds.x + ldata->topOffset.x + ldata->itemPadding.x;
00548   pos.y = (row * (ldata->displayItems.y + ldata->itemPadding.y)) + ldata->itemBounds.y + ldata->topOffset.y + ldata->itemPadding.y;
00549   return pos;
00550 }

00552 eolComponent * eol_list_create_from_config(eolRect winRect,eolKeychain *def)
00553 {
00554   eolUint       id;
00555   eolLine       name;
00556   eolUint       fontSize = 3;
00557   eolRectFloat  rect;
00558   eolUint       listType = 0;
00559   eolBool       allowSelection = eolTrue;
00560   eolBool       showBackground = eolTrue;
00561   eolBool       showVslider = eolTrue,showHslider = eolTrue;
00562   eolVec2D      itemDim;
00563 
00564   if (!def)return NULL;
00565   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(name, def, "name");
00566   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&id, def, "id");
00567   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_rectfloat(&rect, def, "rect");
00568   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_bool(&showVslider, def, "showVSlider");
00569   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_bool(&showHslider, def, "showHSlider");
00570   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&fontSize, def, "fontSize");
00571   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_bool(&showBackground, def, "showBackground");
00572   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_bool(&allowSelection, def, "allowSelection");
00573   return eol_list_new(
00574     id,
00575     name,
00576     rect,
00577     winRect,
00578     listType,
00579     itemDim,
00580     showVslider,
00581     showHslider,
00582     allowSelection,
00583     showBackground,
00584     fontSize,
00585     eol_vec3d(1,1,1),
00586     1
00587   );
00588 }
